Our model was trained vor several more epochs but GPU time on kaggle is rare so we stop here with our proof of principle. Now create the network. Note that this kaggle version of the data set was converted to the DICOM format and for the sake of dataset size only the lowest i. Let s now find the optimal learning rate. 1e 4 seems to be a good value. A large scale dataset for mitotic figure assessment on whole slide images of canine cutaneous mast cell tumor. com rafaelpadilla Object Detection MetricsAdditionally some of my code https github. Note that for this step internet access is required since fast. Additionally the training provides images with a high probability of mitotic figure lookalikes see the paper. As of writing the MITOS_WSI_CCMCT data set is the only set providing mitotic figure annotations and mitotic figure look alikes for the complete microscopy slide image in total 44k mitotic figures on 32 WSI. Create anchors for object detection and show them on the image.
